text:
Image zoom Emily Ratajkowski via Instagram

Model and actress Emily Ratajkowski may have gone for a low-budget wedding, saying her vows in a courthouse ceremony while rocking a $200 Zara suit, but she’s more than making up for it with her ultra-luxurious honeymoon.

According to the Daily Mail, Ratajkowski and her new hubby, producer Sebastian Bear-McClard, are living up their first days and nights as newlyweds at the Utah desert resort Amangiri. There, suites can go for more than $5,000 a night.

“Amangiri is a remote hideaway tucked within the luminous canyons of the American Southwest,” the hotel explains on its website. “Located in a protected valley in Canyon Point with sweeping views, the luxury 5-star resort offers both adrenaline-fueled adventure experiences and a peaceful retreat.”

Image zoom Courtesy of Amangiri

Guests staying at the resort can choose from renting out a private suite, or the resort’s private home, which comes with four bedrooms and its own private pool.

At the resort, Ratajkowski and any other guest can sit back and relax in its expansive spa, which uses “healing traditions of the Navajo through the four elements of earth, wind, fire and water.” The spa also offers stunning vistas of the undeveloped desert landscape below, along with treatments ranging from massages, scrubs, and wraps to flotation therapy.

Image zoom Courtesy of Amangiri

Ratajkowski of course showed off all that the 5-star resort has to offer on her Instagram account. In her first post, the model shared “Morning in the desert” as she took a dip in the hotel’s pool.

Next, the star shared a truly gorgeous sunset from inside her hotel suite:

And another as she sat by her room’s outdoor fire pit.

Ratajkowski shared one final image from Utah on what appears to be a hike through one of the state’s gorgeous slot canyons.

So yeah, she might not have spent big on a wedding, but honestly, it looks like she made the right choice on where to splurge instead.
title: Emily Ratajkowski's Utah Honeymoon Is Way More Luxurious Than Her Wedding

meta_data.description: It looks like the actress and model made the right choice on where to splurge.
